channel.title: More Interface Help [Pi]

item.title: More Interface Help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, so I’m still having troubles getting the timer to start for the minigame. This is the method that tries to bring up the Interface AND the timer, but only the interface works. Also, whenever the actual timer part doesn’t have the // infront of it (I forget the term for getting rid of something without actually deleting it) and whenever I enter the waiting room, it lags me out. Can anybody help? AtomicInt__ helped last time, but I still couldn’t figure it out. Thanks AtomicInt__ for the last help though

public static void gameWaitingRoom() { Iterator iterator = gameWaitingRoom.keySet().iterator(); while (iterator.hasNext()) { Client player = (Client) iterator.next(); if (player != null) { player.getPA().walkableInterface(5730); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Time Until Next Game Starts: " + ((startTimer * 3) + (remainingTime * 3)) + " seconds.", 6570); } } }

Read full topic
